front.title: PCEP Extensions for PCE-initiated Point-to-Multipoint LSP Setup in a Stateful PCE Model

abstract.t: The Path Computation Element (PCE) has been identified as an appropriate technology for the determination of the paths of point- to-multipoint (P2MP) TE LSPs. This document provides extensions required for Path Computation Element communication Protocol (PCEP) so as to enable the usage of a stateful PCE initiation capability in recommending P2MP TE LSP instantiation.
